https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/phJFbiS7OZjpvDZbqBh06u0kRlo.jpg Stella is a beautiful young girl who dreams of becoming one day a famous singer. Her boyfriend Andreas leads a quiet life working at his small store, and doesn't approve Stella's quest for fame. When she decides to leave Athens for a singing job offered to her somewhere in north Greece, Andreas sets off on a quest to find her again and convince her to come back to him Edge of Night
